item.title: Marvel Snap - A New Era of Collectible Card Games
item.description: Introduction # It’s probably too late for me to deconstruct Marvel Snap since the game is classified as high end that take about 4gigs storage both mobile and desktop. So let’s break it down what is Marvel Snap.

item.title: My Highschool Game Project
item.description: I made this blog for my past project that i do when i was on highschool. Pandemic # Just like others, online school is boring. So i started to learn game development.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I’ve been developing game since 2020. You could check my game on itch.io or others project on my github.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Here is my list of projects <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> No Time To Waste January 2024 Global Game Jam 2024 I trained Nicholas D for game designer roles, game programing by Steven W and George M, assets by Kevin Adi Loreâ€™s Quests is a simple and lighthearted 2D ragdoll physics game in which you play as a jester trying to entertain and pander to each and every whim of the King Lore-Lore in order to stay alive.
